item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Charlie Chaplin
item.description: "You'll never find a rainbow if you're looking down" -- Charlie Chaplin

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by دکتر علی شریعتی
item.description:
"در عجبم از مردمانی که خود زیر شلاق ظلم و ستم زندگی می کنند و بر حسین می گریند که آزادانه زیست
" -- دکتر علی شریعتی

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me." -- Henry Ford

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Robert Browning
item.description: "God is the perfect poet." -- Robert Browning

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by دکتر علی شریعتی
item.description: "اگر مثل گاو گنده باشي،ميدوشنت، اگر مثل خر قوي باشي،بارت مي كنند، اگر مثل اسب دونده باشي،سوارت مي شوند.... فقط از فهميدن تو مي ترسند." -- دکتر علی شریعتی

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by دکتر علی شریعتی
item.description: "چه خیال انگیز و جان بخش است اینجا نبودن!" -- دکتر علی شریعتی

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Farzaneh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain
